entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • OutOfMemoryException at Monitor.ReliableEnterTimeout with plenty free memory available #49215
    area-VM-coreclr, Future
  • Test failure:JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests/ArrayExc_d/ArrayExc_d.sh #57539
    arch-x64, os-android, area-Infrastructure, needs further triage
  • NameResolutionTelemetry event source provides average dns lookup time, which is not very informative #57553
    area-System.Net, untriaged
  • Getting managed assembly entrypoint on diagnostic pipe GetProcessInfo2 command during suspension #56808
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • AddEventLog settings silently disappear #51899
    up-for-grabs, area-Extensions-Logging, in pr, Future
  • An error with SignatureAlgorithm in X509Certificate2 (.net core 3.1, .net 5) #57477
    area-System.Security, untriaged, in pr
  • [API Proposal]: RuntimeHelpers.ChangeType<TDelegate>(Delegate) API #57495
    api-suggestion, untriaged
  • ObservableCounter is not work #57564
    untriaged
  • EventPipeEventDispatcher throttling. #57554
    area-Tracing-coreclr, untriaged
  • [MacCatalyst][libraries] Test suites flake with App Crash on CI #53624
    area-CoreLib-mono, os-maccatalyst, 7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Align DCJS with 4.8 implementation. #57533
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • Remove codesign before bundling #57532
    area-Single-File
  • Avoid most of the (small) regressions for seeded and derived Random instances #57530
    area-System.Runtime, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] browser-bench sample URL task argument #57527
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Number handling with converters #57525
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • commenting out an assert that could be triggered on Win7 #57524
    area-VM-coreclr, auto-merge
  • Adding null check to avoid abort when invalid IL is encountered #57522
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Use OID constructor for SignatureAlgorithm. #57514
    area-System.Security, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix Length for ReadOnlySequence created out of sliced Memory owned by MemoryManager #57479
    area-System.Memory, 6.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Fixed H/3 stress server after the last Kestrel change. #57356
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Do not drain HttpContentReadStream if the connection is disposed #57287
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • make use of ports in SPN optional #57159
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0

Updated

  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives` #57395
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • test: add Missing unit tests for Grouping.Any #57550
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Linq, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Make all interpolated string handlers pass by ref #57536
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • Avoid most of the (small) regressions for seeded and derived Random instances #57530
    area-System.Runtime, 6.0.0
  • Use CustomCommand to run runtime tests for mobile targets on helix #57292
  • [main] Update dependencies from dnceng/internal/dotnet-optimization dotnet/arcade dotnet/icu dotnet/llvm-project dotnet/runtime-assets dotnet/msquic #57563
  • [mono] Check for additional implemented variant interfaces #57086
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix the string search behavior when using ICU #57078
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.0
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Add --make-repro-path option to crossgen2 #57543
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove codesign before bundling #57532
    area-Single-File
  • [wasm] [debugger] Cache debugger information on Proxy side to avoid going to debugger-agent everytime. #57404
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] For cross builds targeting s390x use proper objcopy #57566
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix Console.Write on iOS #56713
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Console, os-ios, 6.0.0
  • Fix crashreport for stack overflow #57428
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update changed solution files under src/libraries #57483
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [main] Update dependencies from mono/linker #57565
  • Tls resume PoC (server stateless) #57079
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Refactor subrange assertion generation and propagation #55186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, Future
  • Validate CompressionLevel value is defined in BrotliStream ctor #57561
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [WASM] Adding a new switch to run wasm on NodeJS #54640
    arch-wasm
  • Setup retry for System.Net.* tests #57370
    area-System.Net
  • [WASM] Enabled strict mode on all JS files #54011
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm
  • [release/5.0] Fix ReadOnlySequence created out of sliced Memory owned by MemoryManager #57562
    area-System.Memory, 5.0.x

Closed

  • Fix handling diamond case in GVMs #1416

    area-NativeAOT
  • Improve test project files #1419
    area-NativeAOT

  • Add required dependencies for ops in scanner on ARM #1423

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet sdk check` command is not source-build compatible #19761
    needs team triage, Area-CLI
  • Could add parameters(--local/remote) for workload command? #19755
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • .NET6 preview 7 cannot find System.Net.Quic automatically. #19748
    Area-External, untriaged

Closed

  • [Regression] .NET 6 SDK will no longer copy the netstandard facades to the publish directory for net461 apps #18101
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, 6.0.1xx
  • Improve error message "'Microsoft.NET.SDK.WorkloadAutoImportPropsLocator' specified could not be found." #19765
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • latest.version metadata file is not updated #19634
    untriaged
  • After Installing `6.0.100-rc.1.21416.1` No Incremental Builds #19758
    untriaged
  • Fall back to preview feature band when there is no current workload manifest matching the current SDK #18489
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • ImplicitNamespaceImports generated codefile generates an invalid import if you try to import as an alias. #19446
    Area-NetSDK, 6.0.1xx
  • Unable to load any projects after failed installation of MAUI #19749
    Area-External, untriaged

Updated

  • ItFiltersSatelliteResources test fails on Linux #19783
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Unable to build sdk master #14992
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Linux, Backlog
  • NET 5 cannot produce console app with visible window if it references Windows Forms #14503
    untriaged
  • .NET 5.0.8 cant build with PreBuildEvent #19586
    Area-NetSDK, Discussion
  • Update implicit global usings feature to address issues #19521
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, 6.0.1xx
  • Workload: Add offline cache option to repair command #19775
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workloads: Support custom install locations #19774
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workloads: Ensure commands are atomic #19773
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workloads: Detect and wait for active installs #19770
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Current 6.0 SDK building in VS errors with 'Microsoft.NET.SDK.WorkloadAutoImportPropsLocator' specified could not be found. #17461
    Area-NetSDK, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Set the EnableDynamicLoading property before importing Microsoft.PackageDependencyResolution.targets #19764
    Area-External
  • Default to os and arch options to not self contained #19762
  • Add CodeSignAppHost Task #19757
    Area-External, Team:Runtime

Merged

  • Fix publishing .NET Standard facades #19731
    Area-NetSDK
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19760
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19759
    Area-External
  • Warn instead of error on workload garbage collection exception #19604
    Area-Workloads
  • Add workload fallback to previous feature band #19545
    Area-Workloads
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19750
  • Add header to workload list command output #19598
    Area-Workloads
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19756
    Area-External
  • [Static web assets] Additional unit tests and fixes #19720
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Integrating source build fixes #19649
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #19751
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #19752
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/msbuild #19753
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #19778
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/format #19784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/msbuild #19782
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #19779
  • Add CodeSignAppHost Task #19757
    Area-External, Team:Runtime
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #19781
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/fsharp #19780
    Area-FSharp
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19777
    Area-External
  • Don't show .NET 6 in VS2019 TargetFramework dropdown #19562
    Area-VS
  • Add self contained short flag #19681
  • [Package Validation] resolve references when running API Compat #19771
    Area-Compatibility
  • First pass at upgrading our main hello world tests to target net6.0 #19708
  • Set the EnableDynamicLoading property before importing Microsoft.PackageDependencyResolution.targets #19764
    Area-External
  • Fix workload update #19703
    Area-Workloads
  • Default to os and arch options to not self contained #19762
  • Rename package to Microsoft.DotNet.Compatibility and fix regressions #19733
    Area-Compatibility

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support retrieving original type name from mangled type name #55651
    Feature Request, Area-Language Design, untriaged
  • Roslyn fails to verify nullable attributes on lambda expressions in delegate conversions #55649
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Roslyn fails to corrently infer nullable annotations for implicitly typed variables in deconstruction #55647
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test process crash on Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.EditorFeatures.UnitTests.dll #55639
    Area-IDE, Test, Flaky, untriaged, Infraswat
  • Timeout on Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.CSharp.UnitTests.dll tests #55638
    Area-IDE, Test, Flaky, untriaged
  • [LSP] Initial semantic tokens should be computed against frozen compilation #55637
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged
  • Visual Studio 2022 Changes Refactoring Order #55636
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Closed

  • [Responsiveness] NormalPriorityProcessor.Shutdown initializes lazy Analyzers field triggering a bunch of JIT (30ms on VS shutdown) #55331
    Bug, Area-IDE, Resolution-Fixed, Area-Performance, Performance-Scenario-Solution-Close, Next
  • String interpolation - wrong output #55630
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Nullable references checks and params arrays #55666
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Any source generator doesn't work when using external classes that are defined out of a project having the source generator itself #55310
    Area-Compilers, Need More Info, New Feature - Source Generators, fabric-bot-test
  • Suggestion for unnamed symbols completion: Offer completion for await #52289
    help wanted, Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • Using property marked with MemberNotNullWhen to a NotNull value doesn't get rid of the warning #55664
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations, untriaged
  • Support retrieving original type name from mangled type name #55651
    Feature Request, Area-Language Design, untriaged
  • [Scripting] Revisit Invoke, CreateDelegate methods on ScriptState #3720
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-ScriptingLogic, Backlog
  • IntraTextAdornments conflict with intellicode line completion proposals #55631
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flaky test 'InteractiveHostDesktopTests.StackOverflow' #46414
    Area-Interactive, Test, Flaky, Disabled Test, Backlog
  • InteractiveHostCoreTests.Stackoverflow #53392
    Bug, Area-Interactive, Test, Disabled Test
  • Attempt to load System.Runtime reference assembly for execution causes test failure #53391
    Area-IDE, Test, Flaky, 17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix file naming #55652
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Show destination name #55650
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Extract class bug #55648
    Area-IDE
  • Update codestyle analyzer #55646
    Area-Compilers
  • Use string.Format when an interpolated string part is dynamic #55642
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't hold onto documents in 'Find' features #55635
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55645
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55643
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55644
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/source-build #55605
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #55436
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Obtain OutputRefFilePath from project system #55244
    Area-IDE
  • EnC - Tests for lambda improvements #55224
    Area-Interactive
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55663
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Extract class bug #55648
    Area-IDE
  • Don't hold onto documents in 'Find' features #55635
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Pass updated types to ManagedHotReloadUpdate #55661
    Area-Interactive
  • Prevent exception if their is no else block. #55656
    Area-IDE
  • Inline Hints: Option added for array indexing #55573
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • testing crash in error reporting #55657
    Area-IDE
  • 🐇 Optimize detection of generated code analysis flags #53935
    Area-Analyzers
  • Expand support for context variables #53068
    Area-IDE
  • Update codestyle analyzer #55646
    Area-Compilers
  • Update packages version #55655
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55654
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0 #55653
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix file naming #55652
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Show destination name #55650
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Use string.Format when an interpolated string part is dynamic #55642
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement metadata reference provider #55052
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Merge main to features/MoveStaticMembers #55628
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Improve SyntaxNormalizer performance #50778
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HTTP/3: Consider adding new connection feature for completing or pooling stream #35400
    area-runtime, HTTP3, .NET 7-Candidate

Closed

  • `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.Language.DefaultBoundAttributeDescriptor` Consumes Large Amounts of Memory #35380
    area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs

Updated

  • Default ASP.NET 6 SPA Angular template can't find the ssl certificate files. #34946
    area-mvc, feature-spa, Needs: Attention :wave:, 6.0-rc1
  • dotnet watch stomps over existing hosting startup assemblies #35410
    area-commandlinetools, feature-dotnetwatch
  • Cannot use ASP.NET Core without using Entity Framework. #35381
    area-web-frameworks, Discussions
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.AzureAppServices not sending logs to Blob Storage #28486
    area-runtime, feature-azure, Next sprint planning
  • [Feature] Allow multiple file uploads with their own submit buttons #35413
  • BrotliCompress failing on some builds #35411
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • Blazor WASM apps being blocked by firewalls due to .NET assemblies, even after renaming DLLs #31048
    Working, Docs, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-blazor-boot-up, 6.0-rc1
  • Error when compiling prerendering hosted project with same nuget package on server and client #35254
    question, Needs: Attention :wave:, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, area-razor.compiler, 6.0-rc1
  • Conditional operator without else #35409
  • .Net 6 Preview 7 - Cannot set reponse headers before returning IAsyncEnumerable in controller #35364
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, area-web-frameworks

PullRequests

Created

  • More LoggerMessageAttribute #35368

Merged

  • Remove some low hanging allocations #35397
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc1
  • Set route name metadata in WithName #35388
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • Adapted test case to set Authority to an http address #35361
    area-security, community-contribution, 6.0-rc1
  • Avoid _settingsIndex overflow #35394
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, 6.0-rc1
  • Update SDK #35390
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc1
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35138
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1
  • Enable RazorSourceGenerator all the time #35391
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc1
  • Fix FileLoggerProcessorTests #35305
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • Fix typo in method summary #35385
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 6.0-rc1
  • Update API name in obsolete message #35373
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 6.0-rc1
  • Update SDK to 6.0.100-rc.1.21410.3 #35229
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `aefb454` to `0134d73` #35378
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc1
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #35379
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1

Updated

  • E2E test fixes #35414
  • Use AbortController polyfill even when global fetch is available #34882
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • [Static web assets] Removes private reflection from one of our projects by giving it IVT #35408
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore dotnet/runtime #35402
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fixes for internal runtime usage in build and PRs #35133
    area-infrastructure
  • Add ability to modify UseRouting/UseEndpoint behavior for WebApplicationBuilder #35336
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-hosting, area-web-frameworks
  • Improve error messages for implicit and explicit FromBody attribute in Minimal API #35086 #35188
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix the HttpSys client disconnect race condition #35401
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • HTTP/3: Response drain timeout #35322
    area-runtime
  • Improve Minimal APIs support for request media types #35082 #35230
    area-web-frameworks
  • Use Span for deserializing #35286
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • More LoggerMessageAttribute #35368
  • Use PoolingAsyncValueTaskMethodBuilder on various ReadAsync methods. #35011
    area-runtime
  • Binding support for 'bool' values with InputRadioGroup and InputSelect #35318
    area-blazor
  • W3CLogger Improvement #34195
    area-runtime, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add some analyzers #35359

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] TableView and its underlying elements need to implement IVisualTreeElement overrides #2124
  • [Bug] [Android] Adding new Cell to existing Table Section causes Java.Lang.IllegalStateException #2123
  • [Bug] Changing Grid RowDefinition or ColumnDefinition's Width or Height does not update layout. #2121
    partner, partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] Elements in Grid not moved when calling SetRow or SetColumn #2120
    partner, partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] The application crashes if a Frame is placed inside another one on the main page #2119
  • [Bug] CarouselView not rendering in Android after VS2022 Preview 3 update #2118

Closed

  • [Bug] An iOS application crashes with custom native framework #1916
    t/bug
  • [Spec] Accessibility Talkback and VoiceOver Properties #469
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area/a11y
  • [Enhancement] More Accessible Font Sizes #831
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area/a11y, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] FontSize on label does not rerender to new size the first time it has been reset. #1666
    partner/ui-tools, area/fonts 🅰️, 6.0.100-rc.1

Updated

  • [Bug] dotnet workload install maui Microsoft.Android.Sdk.BundleTool fail #1937
  • [Bug] Read Blazor Webview unhandled exceptions on iOS/Android #2057
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Bug] Using Maui Essentials in a non-MAUI app throws an error on launch #1779
  • [Bug] CarouselView not rendering in Android after VS2022 Preview 3 update #2118
  • [Bug] Elements in Grid not moved when calling SetRow or SetColumn #2120
    partner, partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] Changing Grid RowDefinition or ColumnDefinition's Width or Height does not update layout. #2121
    partner, partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] Can't run Maui.WinUI #2113
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Bug] Unable to run maui or maui-blazor template WinUI option from Visual Studio #2100
  • [Bug] Unable to run either maui or maui blazor templates from the command line #2099
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [Bug] TableView and its underlying elements need to implement IVisualTreeElement overrides #2124

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Failing Android API 30 Device Tests (only on CI) #2127
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [workload] use **FromWorkload** for targeting/runtime pack versions #2122
  • ZStackLayout #2115
    t/enhancement ☀️

Merged

  • Reworked the device tests runner #2110
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Add interface for FontElement to notify element of pending font changes #2106
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #2096
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx-preview7] Update dependencies from xamarin/xamarin-macios #2043
  • [main] Update dependencies from xamarin/xamarin-macios #1939
  • [main] Update dependencies from xamarin/xamarin-android #2103
  • Include CornerRadius and Border everywhere #650
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Fix Failing Android API 30 Device Tests (only on CI) #2127
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Add UseMaui project capability #2130
  • ZStackLayout #2115
    t/enhancement ☀️
  • [workload] use **FromWorkload** for targeting/runtime pack versions #2122
  • Implement WebView2 async request handling with deferral #2055
  • Try work around a hang in MSBuild #2089
  • Implement TextType property in LabelHandlers #976
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Handlers] Add IndicatorView handler for iOS and Android #2038

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RevEng: Dedupe code in scaffolding code generator #25546
    type-cleanup, area-scaffolding
  • RevEng: Add end to end tests which checks from database script to generated code #25543
    area-test
  • RevEng: Foreign key annotations are not printed if it has default facets for core #25542
    customer-reported

Updated

  • EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.LazyLoader using lots of memory #25486
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • Scaffold-DbContext with UseDatabaseNames options not working correctly #25503
    customer-reported
  • PMC Tools: Build only the active project, not the whole solution #9716
    type-enhancement, area-tools, punted-for-6.0, Backlog
  • Please update SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.0.2 to 2.0.4 in EFCore 3.1.* #25497

  • RevEng: Add end to end tests which checks from database script to generated code #25543
    area-test
  • 5.0.9 release notes says there are no changes, but there are #25549
    customer-reported
  • Conditionally mapping two entities to a base entity #25517
    customer-reported
  • EF Core 5.0.1 problem with enum store in tinyint #23858
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query, area-vb, 6.0.0
  • Breaking Change - Not truncating/rounding decimals after upgrade to EF Core 5, Out of Range Exception #25499
    customer-reported
  • EF Core 5 Table Valued Functions Unable to translate collection subquery in projection since the parent query doesn't project key columns of all Exception #23830
    type-enhancement, needs-design, customer-reported, area-query, punted-for-6.0, Backlog

Created

Merged

  • SQLite: Revert multi-threading change #25541

  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #25534
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Disable SSL certificate validation in Cosmos tests #25528
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #25533
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Update SQLite dependencies to 2.0.4 #25550
    Servicing-consider, 3.1.x
  • Add translation for DateTime.UtcNow #25545
  • Add scalar type configuration support to compiled models. #25540
